comments.author: Steve
comments.body:
Ah, this warm fireplace sure feels good. Looks like the sun's coming out too. Time for sunglasses, unless you've got your [Inuit shades](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Inuit_Goggles.jpg) handy!

Anyhow, as Dave mentioned, the docs are at a loss as to what's ailing me.

Tests did show, however, that I have what they called a "super-villain" gene. Can't find that one [on WebMD.](http://www.webmd.com/search/search_results/default.aspx?query=super-villain%20gene&sourceType=undefined")

[

Anyone?

](http://www.webmd.com/search/search_results/default.aspx?query=super-villain%20gene&sourceType=undefined")
